subtitle.fr: Join us for an unforgettable gala evening. Dress code: tuxedo & evening gowns for a truly VIP atmosphere.
subtitle.en: Join us for an unforgettable gala evening. Dress code: tuxedo & evening gowns for a truly VIP atmosphere.

title.fr: The VIP Event of the Year
title.en: The VIP Event of the Year

intro.fr: Get ready to enter a world where luxury, a supercharged atmosphere, and unique experiences meet.
intro.en: Get ready to enter a world where luxury, a supercharged atmosphere, and unique experiences meet.

desc.fr: Upon arrival, a dedicated team welcomes you to a fully privatized space, meticulously decorated for the occasion. The atmosphere is sophisticated: elegant lighting, a lounge ambiance, and chill music create an irresistible first impression.
desc.en: Upon arrival, a dedicated team welcomes you to a fully privatized space, meticulously decorated for the occasion. The atmosphere is sophisticated: elegant lighting, a lounge ambiance, and chill music create an irresistible first impression.

desc.fr: As the evening progresses, the atmosphere intensifies. The lighting transforms, the bass deepens, and the party takes on a whole new dimension. Exclusive dancers and performers take the stage to put on a real show: choreography, immersive entertainment, visual displays... The pace never drops.
desc.en: As the evening progresses, the atmosphere intensifies. The lighting transforms, the bass deepens, and the party takes on a whole new dimension. Exclusive dancers and performers take the stage to put on a real show: choreography, immersive entertainment, visual displays... The pace never drops.

countdown.fr: The highlight of the night: a spectacular countdown with visual effects, live performances, and staging designed to give you an unforgettable emotional peak. The party then continues until 6 AM, driven by an explosive mix, a fiery atmosphere, and a unique collective energy.
countdown.en: The highlight of the night: a spectacular countdown with visual effects, live performances, and staging designed to give you an unforgettable emotional peak. The party then continues until 6 AM, driven by an explosive mix, a fiery atmosphere, and a unique collective energy.

outro.fr: A prestigious, accessible, secure, and unforgettable evening.
outro.en: A prestigious, accessible, secure, and unforgettable evening.

subOutro.fr: A VIP experience designed for those who don't just want a night out... but THE night of the year.
subOutro.en: A VIP experience designed for those who don't just want a night out... but THE night of the year.
